title: BSSC Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 23175 Lower Division Clerk, Junior Regional Investigator and Other Posts
description: The Bihar Staff Selection Commission (BSSC) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 23175Â Lower Division Clerk, Typist, Junior Regional Investigator, Bench Clerk, and Animal Husbandry Helper Jobs. Candidates who have completed their 12th can apply for the BSSC Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have ment...
